text: A starred review is a term used in book reviews to denote a book of distinction or particularly high quality. A starred review can help to increase sales of a book.Gottstein, R. (2010). A starred review. Library Journal, 135(19), 10. Retrieved from http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&db;=a9h&AN;=55551510&site;=ehost- live Kirkus Reviews faced criticism in 2017 after it removed its starred review from American Heart by Laura Moriarty after criticism was leveled at the book for having a white savior narrative. ==References== Category:Book review
title: Starred review
